section.heading: Due date and collection of tax

content.p: Sec. 12-101. Due date and collection of tax.All taxes levied under the provisions of sections12-96to12-100, inclusive, shall be due and collectible as other town taxes and subject to the same liens and processes of collection. Classified land and timber standing thereon and timber products cut from such land shall be subject to lien for unpaid taxes levied under said sections. Any timber products unlawfully removed from such land, or upon which the full amount of yield tax has not been paid, shall be liable to seizure by the town, wherever found, and, after due notice, may be sold to satisfy such unpaid taxes and the expense of seizure and sale.
